title: Western-style ornate caps "White Bear"
content:
Am trying to track down either the exact face or, more realistically, a similar one to the attached file — beautiful old pub signage, if anyone can be of any assistance I would be most grateful…

Cheers,  
Matt Judge  
 [matt@seadesign.co.uk](mailto:matt@seadesign.co.uk)
